title: WINDOWS 10 & League of Legends
body: @Riot, just a warning that League does not work with the Windows 10 Preview. Might not work with the official release as well. just letting you know.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Dihaka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nGkkjgv0,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-22T10:01:03.382+0000)
>
> @Riot, just a warning that League does not work with the Windows 10 Preview. Might not work with the official release as well. just letting you know.

I should have seen that before I play

League of Legends is now compatible with Windows 10, and using Windows 10 shouldn't cause any problems. What sort of issues are you encountering? Hopefully I can help you with any issues that you have.

I have a Problem,first of all it was crashing when i was picking a champ and it Comes back ,then i coud pick champs but everytime i go in game it kikcs me out to repair,now when i get in game my loading Screen is 0% and suddenly goes to 100 but it says i am disconetcted and i cant cet in game and of Course get banns for nothing,pls help me

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nGkkjgv0,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2016-10-04T18:02:03.677+0000)
>
> League of Legends is now compatible with Windows 10, and using Windows 10 shouldn't cause any problems. What sort of issues are you encountering? Hopefully I can help you with any issues that you have.

2 years late xD, Btw i had windows 10 during the Testing period worked fine for me only problem i had is when i didnt support dual screen at the time wasnt compatible with latest Nvidia drivers but all g :D

I have Windows 10 and I'm thinking that are the problems based on that? When I'm going to game I come into it about 37seconds late and in teamfights my fps goes from 100 to 04 and ping raises from 55 to 200.... what is the problem? Computer is a new hp pavilion and is suitable for gaming. I have 8years old hp pavilion at my parents and I have played with it many years...

With Windows 10 League of Legends very often crushes when choosing a champion or banning one during a game. It's a bit frustrating. I don't know if it's a problem of Microsoft or Riot, but on setup it indicates compatibility just with Windows 8 or previous versions.

> [{quoted}](name=Dihaka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nGkkjgv0,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-22T10:01:03.382+0000)
>
> @Riot, just a warning that League does not work with the Windows 10 Preview. Might not work with the official release as well. just letting you know.


> [{quoted}](name=Dihaka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nGkkjgv0,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-22T10:01:03.382+0000)
>
> @Riot, just a warning that League does not work with the Windows 10 Preview. Might not work with the official release as well. just letting you know.
MY client doesn't crash but the screen is blurry the whole time I cant see anything play help!!!!!!

I believe that the pvp patcher used to use internet explorer which doesnt exist any more, perhaps lol is looking for stuff that isnt there any more? Im still not able to play league in case I lag during game again Im already on 5 game 20 minute ban due to trying to fix the issue!
It works perfectly fine with windows 10 preview. I've had windows 10 preview for about a month now and I haven't experienced any issues.

Why would they not prepare ahead of time for a new operation system? Giving us previews of things and not always fixable things on a not completely trustable operation system is not at all a good idea. Making players wait will make them lose interest. Intern losing money. Hopefully they fix soon.

> Resolved a crash issue with the Windows 10 technical preview

Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-56-notes#patch-bugfixes

I've had this problem on my windows 10 PC too... almost every game i try to play the client crashes at some point, usually the game has already hit loading point and so doesn't crash the game itself (for some reason... which i am not complaining about :P ) 
however it has cost me a few leave buster bans. that i am complaining about... esp when it's leave buster while trying to play ranked games... and i can't find this button to send in my logs anywhere... which makes trying to prove it isn't me just being a troll a little harder than i would like.
It might be a windows 10 problem not a riot problem?
